Class Button

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeButton, OptionButton, SettingsButton, StartButton, VolumeButton
public abstract class Button extends greenfoot.Actor
Has the logic to detect the mouse relation to the button Calls the function in the subclass
Version:
Author:
Jerry Xing, Jean Pan, Felix Zhao

      imageStates - where the image is located

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      Checks the state of the mouse in relation to the button If the mouse is hovering If the mouse is clicked on the button If the mouse let go after clicking on the button

      height - sets the height of the button to height
